dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in 2025, at the Astana International Forum, President Tokayev really laid out Kazakhstan's energy and climate priorities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in twenty twenty five, at the Astana International Forum, President Tokayev really laid out Kazakhstan's energy and climate priorities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President of Kazakhstan Kassym-Jomart Tokayev delivered a speech at the Astana International Forum (AIF). The Astana International Forum is taking place on May 29–30, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he mentioned that they hold, uh, forty percent of the world's uranium reserves—so nuclear energy is a huge part of their national strategy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he mentioned that they hold, uh, forty percent of the world's uranium reserves-so nuclear energy is a huge part of their national strategy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan, which holds 40 percent of the world's uranium reserves, considers nuclear energy a priority in its national strategy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But he was also very clear that development can't be sustainable without tackling the climate crisis. He pointed out Central Asia is warming twice as fast as the global average.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But he was also very clear that development can't be sustainable without tackling the climate crisis. He pointed out Central Asia is warming twice as fast as the global average.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, development cannot be sustainable without addressing the climate crisis. Central Asia is one of the most climate-vulnerable regions in the world, where warming is occurring twice as fast as the global average, Tokayev stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is just… alarming, honestly. But it sounds like they're taking a pretty proactive approach with a coordinated regional climate agenda.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is just... alarming, honestly. But it sounds like they're taking a pretty proactive approach with a coordinated regional climate agenda.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President noted that in response, the country is advancing a pragmatic and regionally coordinated climate agenda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and they're partnering with the UN to host a major environmental summit in 2026, aimed at aligning Central Asia's strategies with global goals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and they're partnering with the U N to host a major environmental summit in twenty twenty six, aimed at aligning Central Asia's strategies with global goals.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2026, Kazakhstan, in partnership with the UN, will host a regional environmental summit aimed at aligning Central Asia's strategies with global ambitions, Tokayev added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And speaking of the UN, he highlighted that new Regional Center for Sustainable Development Goals in Almaty—that just got approved by the General Assembly two months ago.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And speaking of the U N, he highlighted that new Regional Center for Sustainable Development Goals in Almaty-that just got approved by the General Assembly two months ago.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Two months ago, the UN General Assembly officially established the UN Regional Center for Sustainable Development Goals for Central Asia and Afghanistan in Almaty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's a big deal for multilateral cooperation in the region. The center's supposed to support joint projects and provide technical expertise.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a big deal for multilateral cooperation in the region. The center's supposed to support joint projects and provide technical expertise.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Center will support joint projects, provide technical expertise, and coordinate international collaboration, the President said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It really feels like Kazakhstan is trying to position itself as a leader, not just nationally but for the whole region—stable, integrated, future-oriented, all that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really feels like Kazakhstan is trying to position itself as a leader, not just nationally but for the whole region-stable, integrated, future-oriented, all that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He also emphasized that Kazakhstan remains committed to a stable, integrated, and future-oriented Central Asia based on mutual respect and regional solidarity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And the forum itself is such a key platform—governments, companies, academics all there to discuss everything from security to ecology.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And the forum itself is such a key platform-governments, companies, academics all there to discuss everything from security to ecology.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Astana International Forum is a platform for dialogue among representatives of governments, international organizations, major companies, and academia to discuss the most pressing global issues—from the economy and security to ecology and climate.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Connecting Minds, shaping the future—that's the theme this year. Pretty fitting for the kinds of challenges they're facing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Connecting Minds, shaping the future-that's the theme this year. Pretty fitting for the kinds of challenges they're facing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The theme of the forum is: Connecting Minds, Shaping the Future.
